item.title: Review - Soft Skills - The software developer's life manual
item.description: ‘Soft Skills: The Software Developer’s Life Manual’ is a book written by John Somnez, I first heard of John on the Dot Net Rocks podcast. After that I started to following his fitness podcast Get UP and Code. Nowadays I mainly follow him on his YouTube channel ‘Simple Programmer’.
